title: Wind Moment
summary: A perfect alignment of wind, fabric, and light—caught in the fraction of a second.
story: Some images you plan. This one happened. The wind decided the composition.
technique: Fast shutter, natural light, embracing the unpredictable.
quote: The wind knows better than I do.

title: Light Leak
summary: Unexpected light bleeding into the frame creates an accidental masterpiece.
story: A technical mistake became the best part of the image.

title: Between Frames
summary: The moment between poses—when the model thinks the camera isn't watching.
story: Real moments happen when people stop performing.
technique: Continuous shooting to capture transitional moments.

title: Happy Accident
summary: Motion blur and timing combine into something better than the planned shot.
story: I was trying to capture something else entirely. This is what I got instead.
